links.title: Apple finds supplier problems as its audits expand
links.description: Technology 23 minutes ago (Mar 07, 2018 08:37PM ET) © Reuters. FILE PHOTO: Apple logo is pictured inside the newly opened Omotesando Apple store at a shopping district in Tokyo, Japan By Stephen Nellis (Reuters) - Apple Inc (O:) said on Wednesday that it had found violations of its labor and environmental policies for suppliers, such as falsifying work hours data, as it expanded the scope of its annual audit of conditions of workers making its iPhones and other products.
